message.frozendawn.freeze.biting: The cold is biting into you...
message.frozendawn.freeze.extreme: Extreme cold! Find shelter or warmth!
advancement.frozendawn.root.title: The Sun Grows Cold
advancement.frozendawn.root.description: The apocalypse has begun. Earth drifts from its star.
advancement.frozendawn.phase2.title: A Dying World
advancement.frozendawn.phase2.descriptio: Phase 2: Water freezes and vegetation begins to die.
advancement.frozendawn.phase3.title: The Long Night
advancement.frozendawn.phase3.descriptio: Phase 3: Permanent storms rage. The surface grows lethal.
advancement.frozendawn.phase4.title: Deep Freeze
advancement.frozendawn.phase4.descriptio: Phase 4: Even the earth itself freezes solid.
advancement.frozendawn.phase5.title: Eternal Winter
advancement.frozendawn.phase5.descriptio: Phase 5: The sun is a distant memory. Only the deep earth holds warmth.
